synopsis: AWS IoT 1-Click makes it easy for customers to incorporate simple ready-to-use IoT devices into their workflows. These devices can trigger AWS Lambda functions that implement business logic. In order to build applications using AWS IoT 1-Click devices, programmers can use the AWS IoT 1-Click Devices API and the AWS IoT 1-Click Projects API. Learn more at https://aws.amazon.com/documentation/iot-1-click/
